summary: Comprehensive testing of Dental Clinic website completed. All 13 features tested successfully. Backend API tests: 18/18 passed. Frontend UI tests: All critical flows working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
RTL direction properly implemented throughout the app
data-testid attributes present for admin login buttons (desktop and mobile)
Protected routes working correctly with localStorage token check
Email notification service integrated but may need SMTP configuration for production
seed_data_creation: Test appointments created with TEST_ prefix during backend testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Backend API tests in /app/backend/tests/test_dental_clinic_api.py cover: admin auth, appointments CRUD, status endpoints. Frontend tested: homepage sections, navigation, admin login flow, appointment booking, mobile menu, contact section, footer, logout functionality.

features_tested.1_homepage_loads: PASS - All sections (Hero, Services, About, Appointments, Contact) present
features_tested.2_header_navigation: PASS - All navigation links scroll to correct sections
features_tested.4_appointment_booking: PASS - Form submits successfully, saves to MongoDB, shows success toast
features_tested.5_admin_login_page: PASS - Login with admin/Manal*2024 works, redirects to dashboard
features_tested.6_admin_dashboard: PASS - Displays appointments with stats, filters, and search
features_tested.7_protected_route: PASS - /admin/dashboard redirects to login if not authenticated
features_tested.8_logout_functionality: PASS - Clears token and redirects to login
features_tested.9_whatsapp_phone_buttons: PASS - WhatsApp (wa.me/212536339355) and phone (tel:) links present
features_tested.10_google_maps: PASS - Google Maps iframe embedded in Contact section
features_tested.11_footer_links: PASS - Quick links, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp links present
features_tested.13_mobile_menu: PASS - Mobile menu opens with all navigation items including admin login button
